entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
